title: I finally caught them all in Pokemon Sun and Moon
body:
Woot, it only took me over 100 hours, probably would have taken shorter if I turned off animations much earlier but meh its been a while since I played pokemon. This is my second pokedex ever filled out, the first one was Pokemon Yellow :)

It was so satisfying to catch Necrozma with a Master Ball as the last one for the Pokedex, just like how I saved it for Mewtwo  in Pokemon Yellow.

I'd like to give a shout out to CLG Elephant who has been just absolutely wonderful at trading back and forth a lot of pokemon so I could eevolvee them :)

Now I can obsessively breed/chain SOS shiny pokemon more efficiently :D

http://i.imgur.com/YeIq7Jf.png
http://i.imgur.com/D2voGdv.png?1
http://i.imgur.com/RneDTDu.png
